tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pet_id INT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
    treatment VARCHAR(255),
    prescription TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    pet_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT,
    prescription TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  pet_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment TEXT,
  prescription TEXT
);
